About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Bio

My 11 years in the IT industry has given me a strong foundation of technical skills and a desire to always learn more. In addition to my Web Development skills, I also possess great problem-solving skills, being able to thrive under stress and an ability to adapt and learn. I am skilled with JavaScript, AngularJS, SQL, HTML and CSS. I have nearly 3 years’ experience using these skills in the working environment. In my off time I'm always pushing to learn more, by doing additional courses. In addition to my Web Development skills, I have a wealth of knowledge with Systems Support, from helping users with learning a new system to setting up and maintaining servers. I always meet my deadlines and enjoy the challenge, including working late and weekends to ensure a smooth migration or to ensure an issue is fixed.

UCS GAAP

Senior Support Technician

Providing technical and software on site support to clients / Network testing and support / Solving clients' problems, varying with their needs and requirements / Installing and troubleshooting regular and specialized computers / Installing and troubleshooting GPRS and 3G modems that connect via APN to our servers at the head office / Providing telephonic support / Customer liaison / VPN set up ADSL set up and support / Training of customers / Working after hours and being on standby / Planning and prioritizing tasks for the day / Providing feedback and suggestions in weekly meetings / Training customers and new technicians
Left to study

NCD Solutions

Senior Technician

Provide telephonic support / Uphold SLA’s with customers / Setup, install and troubleshoot Backup Exec / Setup, install and troubleshoot Backup Exec System Recovery / Setup, install and troubleshoot SonicWall firewalls / Setup, install HP and Dell servers / Migrate servers from Microsoft Server 2003 – 2012 / Migrate servers from Microsoft Server 2008 – 2012 / Virtualise physical servers to virtual machines / Setup HyperV visualization on server 2012 / Setup VMware ESXI Server / Maintain customer relations / Provide on-site technical support / PC hardware maintenance and repair / Software installation and support including: Microsoft Office Suite 2003, 2007, 2010, 2013 / SQL installation / Server recovery from bare metal to recovering lost files / Support and installation and maintaining Microsoft Exchange Server 2003, 2007, 2010 / Capture job cards, time sheets and travel sheets / Provide best solutions for customers on products, new hardware and technologies / Set up Office 365, maintain 365 and support 365 / Log calls for Telkom and other ISP’s / Running backups and maintenance on servers / Provide support for dell and HP desktops / Set up and configure Wi-Fi units / Setting up network policy and access services / Setting up remote desktop services / Research problems I haven’t encountered and finding a solution as quick as possible / Setting up and maintaining DHCP and WSUS / Setting up Active Directory and maintaining / Setting up and supporting Blackberry, Android and iOS phones / Setting up BES servers / Setting up and maintaining ESET Anti Virus as well as remote administration / Setting up N-able and Spiceworks managed services / Training users how to use new products / Working overtime / Manage and train junior technicians / Installation and troubleshooting UPS's / Maintain networks and cabling / Setting up HP printers /Maintain DNS Services / Troubleshooting IIS / Installing Pastel, QuickBooks and Syspro
Left to become a programmer

Indian Ocean Export Company

Developer & IT Manager

As Developer some of the technologies I use are JavaScript / AngularJS / jQuery / HTML / CSS / Material Design / PDF Make / C# / ASP.Net / Setting up and maintaining IIS / NPM / SQL / Visual Studio Team Services / Scrum Agile Methodology / Completing assigned and additional tasks for the day / End to end testing / Reviewing colleague's code / Publishing changes In parallel to the development I am involved in training the users on the software / Collecting feedback / Monitoring for any potential issues / Logging and resolving any discovered issues With my other Job Title of IT Manager, I manage the multiple Microsoft 2012 servers / FortiGate Firewall / Far South VOIP system / Maintaining the SQL databases / Setting up and monitoring SQL replication / CCTV systems / Setting up and managing Veeam backups / Manage IT Budgets / IT Inventory / Managing all IT suppliers / Sourcing and comparing quotes / Determining and Implementing IT Policies / Manage 3 contractors who handle the day to day user support
